mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SALE(saleNum, rn, saleDate, whsalCd, whsalName, cmpCd, cmpName, large, largeName, large, largeName, small, smallName, totQty, totAmt, minAmt, maxAmt, avgAmt) VALUES (null,#{rn}, #{saleDate}, #{whsalCd}, #{whsalName}, #{cmpCd}, #{cmpName}, #{large}, #{largeName}, #{large}, #{largeName}, #{small}, #{smallName}, #{totQty}, #{totAmt}, #{minAmt}, #{maxAmt}, #{avgAmt})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SALE WHERE whsalCd=#{whsalCd} AND saleDate BETWEEN #{saleDateStart} AND #{saleDateEnd} AND `large` LIKE concat ('%',#{largeCd},'%')
SELECT midName, COUNT(midName) dataCnt FROM SALE WHERE saleDate=#{saleDate} GROUP by midName ORDER by dataCnt desc LIMIT 3
SELECT whsalName, COUNT(whsalName) totCnt FROM SALE WHERE saleDate=#{saleDate} GROUP by whsalName ORDER by totCnt desc LIMIT 6
SELECT ROUND(SUM(totQty)) totQty FROM SALE WHERE saleDate=#{saleDate}
SELECT ROUND(SUM(totAmt)) totAmt FROM SALE WHERE saleDate=#{saleDate}
